Basically the female got pregnant with pearl dick's child. Pearl dick got killed off while committing a crime. She became addicted to sex, and the MC decides to support her because he loves her. He said he will stay with her through her troubled times. Honestly this ending makes me mad, not because the MC is a cuckold. It's the fact that they killed off pearl dick. I wanted to see her being forever pearl dick's bitch, and reverting back to her former glory as a female gang's boss. Basically, make a new gang with pearl dick as boss, and Yayoi as female boss. This ending is a cop out. BOOOOOO. BTW what male would want a three way with another male. You gay?
